name: Business-hooiznes
description: An amateur russian startupper creates several business plans but there is not enough cash for bringing them to life. The Startupper wins 1 kekollar at the “Naiobka” casino but it still won’t do for the business start.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Potato Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 screen resolution
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel core I88 Memory: 228 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 666 Storage: 1337 GB available space
